column1: Jack is in the kitchen in his house. Jack wants a cold drink from the refrigerator. The refrigerator is full of fresh food. Jack thinks the refrigerator is full of fresh food. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Jack doesn't see the bird fly into the kitchen.

Caden is in his new house. Caden wants to fix all the things that are not right. There is a big leak in the roof. Caden thinks there is a big leak in the roof. A bird lands on the roof. Caden doesn't see the bird land on the roof.

Vivi is in her room playing with her toys. Vivi wants to lay her small, patient triangle toy on the shelf with her other toys. The triangle toy is in her toy box. Vivi believes the triangle toy is in her toy box. A bird flies into the room through the open window. Vivi doesn't see the bird fly into the room.

Emma is in her room after a long day at school. Emma wants to draw on her white bathrobe to make it look creative. The bathrobe is plain and white. Emma believes the bathrobe is plain and white. A cat walks into Emma's room. Emma doesn't see the cat walk into her room.

Ollie is at the beach building a sand castle. Ollie wants to dig a deep hole with his spade. The spade is sharp and safe to use. Ollie thinks the spade is sharp and safe to use. A seagull lands near Ollie's sand castle. Ollie doesn't see the seagull land near his sand castle.

Ben is at the train station. Ben wants to catch the train to go to work. The train is on time. Ben believes the train is on time. A crazy dog runs across the train tracks. Ben doesn't see the crazy dog run across the tracks.

Pia is at her school library. Pia wants to read a mystery book. The mystery book is on the top shelf. Pia thinks the mystery book is on the top shelf. A cat sneaks into the library. Pia doesn't see the cat sneak into the library.

Chloe is at a fair in her town. Chloe wants to hug the fireman at the fair. The fireman is very friendly. Chloe thinks the fireman is very friendly. A clown starts making balloon animals at the fair. Chloe doesn't see the clown making balloon animals.

Wendy is at a yard sale in her town. Wendy wants to buy a beautiful bracelet she saw. The bracelet is shiny and cheap. Wendy believes the bracelet is shiny and cheap. A dog runs through the yard sale, knocking over a table. Wendy does not see the dog run through the yard sale.

Yara is in her room with her favorite teddy bear, Stitch. Yara wants to hide Stitch so her little brother cannot find him. Stitch smells like yummy vanilla because Yara sprayed him with her vanilla perfume. Yara believes Stitch smells like yummy vanilla. A cat enters the room through the open door. Yara does not see the cat enter the room.

Nia is in her home, ready to bake a cake. Nia wants to bake a cake in the oven. The oven is in good working order. Nia believes the oven is in good working order. A cat walks into the kitchen. Nia does not see the cat walk into the kitchen.

Amy is walking in the park. Amy wants to sit on a bench and rest. The bench is covered with pretty vines. Amy believes the bench is covered with pretty vines. A squirrel runs across the path in front of Amy. Amy doesn't see the squirrel running across the path.

Kate is in the park with her old toy car. Kate wants to drive the toy car on the clean cloth she brought. The cloth is clean and spread on the grass. Kate believes the cloth is clean and ready for her toy car. A butterfly lands on Kate's toy car. Kate doesn't see the butterfly land on her toy car.

Ella is at the park with her parent. Ella wants to complete her ice cream before it melts. The ice cream has a sweet taste. Ella believes her ice cream has a sweet taste. A light rain begins to fall. Ella doesn't feel the light rain.

Uma is in her room with a big clock on the wall. Uma wants to move the clock to another room. The clock is brown. Uma believes the clock is brown. A cat enters the room and starts playing with a ball of yarn. Uma doesn't see the cat playing.

Fred was at the park with his friends. Fred wanted to play a beautiful song on his trumpet for his friends. The trumpet was in his bag. Fred believed the trumpet was in his bag. A dog started chasing its tail near Fred. Fred did not see the dog chasing its tail.

Amy was in her room playing with her toy angel. Amy wanted to make the angel fly in the air. The angel's wings were open wide. Amy believed the angel's wings were open wide. A butterfly enters the room. Amy doesn't see the butterfly.

Sally is in the garden in her house. Sally wants to plant flowers in the earth. The earth is dry and warm. Sally believes the earth is dry and warm. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Sally doesn't see the butterfly.

Lily Mae was at the market on a sunny Sunday. Lily Mae wanted to sell her strong perfume. The perfume had a sweet scent. Lily Mae believed that the perfume had a sweet scent. A dog starts barking loudly at the market. Lily Mae doesn't hear the dog barking.

Dora is at the farm with her dad. Dora wants to ride the big, hairy horse. The horse is standing in the field. Dora believes the horse is standing in the field. A butterfly lands on Dora's hand. Dora doesn't see the butterfly land on her hand.

Ben was at the park playing with his dog. Ben wanted to make his dog's hair look nice by brushing it. The dog's hair was very safe to touch. Ben believed the dog's hair was safe to touch. A squirrel runs past Ben and his dog. Ben doesn't see the squirrel run past.

Lila was in an ancient city. Lila wanted to walk on the ancient road. The road was full of old stones. Lila believed the road was full of old stones. A cat crossed her path. Lila didn't see the cat crossing her path.

Quinn was at the park on a sunny day. Quinn wanted to unite his friends for a fun event. The picnic basket was full of food. Quinn believed the picnic basket was full of food. A butterfly lands on Quinn's shoulder. Quinn does not see the butterfly land on his shoulder.

Harry was at the park with his little red wagon. Harry wanted to ride his wagon down the big hill. The wagon was safe and sturdy. Harry believed his wagon was safe and sturdy. A butterfly lands on the handle of the wagon. Harry doesn't see the butterfly.

Ollie was on a beach during the day. Ollie wanted to find a special shell hidden under the palm trees. The shells were hidden under the sand. Ollie believed the shells were hidden under the sand. A scared crab quickly runs across the beach. Ollie doesn't see the scared crab running across the beach.

Quinn was at the farm with all the animals. Quinn wanted to feed the goat. The goat was in the organized pen. Quinn believed the goat was in the organized pen. A loud truck passes by the farm. Quinn does not hear the loud truck passing by.

Nia was in the attic of her old house. Nia wanted to find her old toy car in the attic. The toy car was thin and charged. Nia believed that the toy car was thin and charged. A bird lands on the attic window sill. Nia does not see the bird land on the window sill.

Yara was at a toy store. Yara wanted to buy a model car for her little brother. The model car was on the top shelf. Yara believed the model car was on the top shelf. A clown starts performing tricks in the store. Yara doesn't notice the clown performing tricks.
Kim was in the park with her friends. Kim wanted to eat her pasta lunch. The pasta was in a plastic box. Kim thought the pasta was in a plastic box. It starts to rain. Kim doesn't feel the rain.

Ben was in his room playing with his toy robot. Ben wanted his robot to move and speak. The toy robot's battery was fully charged. Ben believed the toy robot's battery was fully charged. A cold breeze blew through the open window. Ben didn't feel the cold breeze.

Carla was in a small, old church. Carla wanted to pray at the modest cross. The cross was in the open. Carla believed the cross was in the open. A bell rings from the church tower. Carla does not hear the bell ring.

Sam was at a big art show. Sam wanted to buy a creative painting. The painting had a low price. Sam believed the painting had a low price. A child starts to cry loudly in the art show. Sam doesn't hear the child crying.

Rita was at the park for a walk. Rita wanted to sit on a clean bench. The bench was clean and dry. Rita believed the bench was clean and dry. A dog runs past her, chasing a ball. Rita doesn't see the dog chasing the ball.

Polly was at the bus stop. Polly wanted to start her journey to school. The bus was on time. Polly believed the bus was on time. An icy wind blew through the bus stop. Polly did not feel the icy wind.

Zoe was in her room with a big box of toys. Zoe wanted to sort her toys and put them in the box. The box was open. Zoe believed the box was open. A cat jumps onto the bed. Zoe doesn't see the cat jump onto the bed.

Pete was at home, ready to sew a button on his shirt. Pete wanted to use a clean thread to sew the button. The thread was clean and ready to use. Pete thought the thread was clean and ready to use. A cat walks into the room. Pete doesn't see the cat walk into the room.

Rosa was in her room with her furry cat. Rosa wanted to play music and have her cat sit with her. The music player was fully charged. Rosa believed the music player was fully charged. A butterfly flies into the room through the open window. Rosa doesn't see the butterfly fly into the room.

Nia was in the garden picking vegetables. Nia wanted to pick some crunchy celery for her salad. The celery was clean and fresh. Nia believed the celery was clean and fresh. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Nia doesn't see the butterfly.

Vicky was in her room, feeling lonely. Vicky wanted to call her friend to chat. The phone had a lot of numbers. Vicky believed the phone had a lot of numbers. A bird flies into the room through the open window. Vicky doesn't see the bird fly into the room.

Xander was in his garden, tending to his plants. Xander wanted to supply water to his plants. The earth in the garden was dry and thirsty. Xander believed the earth was dry and thirsty. A butterfly lands on a flower in the garden. Xander does not see the butterfly landing on the flower.

Ivy was at a pet shop. Ivy wanted to buy a small cat with soft fur. She had enough money to buy the cat. Ivy believed she had enough money to buy the cat. A dog in the pet shop starts barking loudly. Ivy doesn't hear the dog barking.
Mae was in her garden. Mae wanted to feed the birds with a worm. The worm was big and juicy. Mae believed the worm was big and juicy. A rainbow appears in the sky. Mae doesn't see the rainbow.

Ruby was at the park with her friends. Ruby wanted to skip with her jump rope. The rope was coiled up neatly. Ruby believed the rope was coiled up neatly. A group of birds start to sing loudly in a nearby tree. Ruby doesn't hear the birds singing.

Nellie was in the park with her friends. Nellie wanted to share her pizza with her friends. The pizza box was closed. Nellie believed the pizza box was closed. A squirrel ran up a tree nearby. Nellie didn't see the squirrel run up the tree.

Harry was in school, waiting for the quiz to start. Harry wanted to do well on the quiz. The quiz looked easy. Harry believed the quiz was easy. A bird flies into the classroom through the open window. Harry doesn't see the bird fly into the classroom.

Iris was at a big game in the park. Iris wanted to find a lucky seat to watch the game. The seat was hard and uncomfortable. Iris thought the seat was hard and uncomfortable. A squirrel runs across the field. Iris doesn't see the squirrel run across the field.

Ella was at the park near the hospital. Ella wanted to eat her apple under the high tree. The apple was very fresh. Ella believed her apple was very fresh. An ambulance arrives at the nearby hospital. Ella doesn't see the ambulance arrive.

Yara was in the park with her friends. Yara wanted to create a strong mud castle. The mud was wet and easy to shape. Yara believed the mud was wet and easy to shape. A butterfly lands on Yara's shoulder. Yara doesn't see the butterfly land on her shoulder.

Xander is at a loud party with his friends. Xander wants to hear his friend's adventurous story. His friend's voice is loud and clear. Xander believes his friend's voice is loud and clear. A balloon pops at the other end of the room. Xander doesn't hear the balloon pop.

Rita was in her small village. Rita wanted the village to become more obedient and quiet. The village was peaceful and intact. Rita believed the village was peaceful and intact. A group of birds suddenly fly over the village. Rita does not see the birds flying over the village.
